siteMetadata.title: 国外股市热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览国外股票社区里的热门讨论

blogPost.title:
Sen. Bernie Sanders said Monday he plans to filibuster the Senate’s vote to overturn Trump’s veto of the defense spending bill, unless Majority Leader Mitch McConnell agrees to vote on a bill to raise individuals’ stimulus payments to $2,000.
https://t.co/gA6Se7nghR
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text:
参议员桑德斯周一表示，他计划阻挠参议院推翻特朗普否决国防开支法案的投票，除非多数党领袖米奇·麦康奈尔(Mitch McConnell)同意就一项将个人刺激支出提高到2,000美元的法案进行投票。
https://t.co/gA6Se7nghR

參議員桑德斯週一表示，他計劃阻撓參議院推翻特朗普否決國防開支法案的投票，除非多數黨領袖米奇·麥康奈爾(Mitch McConnell)同意就一項將個人刺激支出提高到2,000美元的法案進行投票。
https://t.co/gA6Se7nghR

previous.excerpt:
Looking to invest into the market with a little bit of money and see how it
goes. I have a couple ideas in mind but I’ve never invested before and am
seeking some possible advice or ideas. Anything is appreciated. Thank you
previous.title: If you had 3k to invest in your first stocks, what companies would you invest in?

localize.title: 如果你有3k來投資你的第一批股票，你會投資哪些公司？

localize.title: 商品投資第二部分：新一輪週期的開始及其帶來的巨大機遇
localize.the_new_excerpt:
一個多月前，我寫了一篇關於我爲什麼相信大宗商品和
與商品相關的股票將提供更好的投資資本回報。
與市場中的其他行業(科技、消費品、醫療保健等)相比
在接下來的十年裏。爲什麼我相信是這樣的呢，就是一個簡單的…
